name: Billy The Sprite Finale
description:
Billy the Sprite is a 3-level game by Melvin Cruz and Victoria Garcia.

Billy is out on an adventure to see how many fruits he can collect. He hopes to stay healthy but has no fruits of his own. So he must set out to scavenge for them. Be careful though some fruits can be dangerous.

Use WASD to move Billy around. Apples and cherries are Billy's favorite but be careful of those bananas.

Credits: 

Pixel Adventure 1, Unity Store, Pixel Frog for background art and sprites

Trillium Line by Admiral Bob (c) copyright 2020 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/admiralbob77/60919 Ft: apoxode for background audio

Leshy Labs Pick Up 5 for pickup audio
